item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][title_subtitle title_type="h2" add_subtitle="use_subtitle" title="Delivery" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]What courier do you use for deliveries? We use DHL to send all of our orders and they are forwarded to the national postal service on arrival in the country of destination. How long does delivery take? International orders generally take between 1-3 working days to arrive. A delivery within Germany usually takes 1-2 working days. How much is delivery? We offer FREE Delivery on all orders over 50 / 50 / 50 CHF. Can I track my item? Yes. You will be sent a confirmation email as soon as your order has been processed. This email will also contain your tracking number. Do you deliver to my country? We currently ship to the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Ireland and the UK.[/vc_column_text][title_subtitle title_type="h2" add_subtitle="use_subtitle" title="Payment" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]Which payment methods do you accept? We currently accept all relevant credit and debit cards including Visa, Mastercard, PayPal and Postfinance. What currencies can I use? We accept payment in Euros, GBP and CHF only.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][title_subtitle title_type="h2" add_subtitle="use_subtitle" title="Returns" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]What is your online returns policy? If you are not completely happy with the goods that you have received, you can return them to us within 14 days of receipt, providing they are in original resalable condition. Once returned you are entitled to receive an exchange or a refund. We are not able to refund or exchange items that appear to have been worn, washed, or are not in original condition. Please enclose the completed Returns Form with your goods, and make sure all returned items are well packaged, so as not to be damaged in the post. How do I return an item? To return an item you can simply complete the enclosed returns form and attach the return address to the package and take it to your local post office. Who pays for return postage? We offer FREE return postage on all orders returned within 14 days of receipt. Can you confirm you have received my return? We aim to process returns within 2 working days of receiving them. You will be notified by email once the returns process is complete.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Villenoir Cabernet Sauvignon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" reverse_columns_mobile="yes" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218257591{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218019260{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6" css_tablet=".vc_custom_1681218019261{padding: 15% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Tasting notes" subtitle="Wine specs"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1460727890422{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Deep garnet with a vibrant ruby edge, velvety soft on the palate with bright cherry to plum flavors. This wine is weighty and full of fresh ripe berries with rich, dark accents of cocoa nib. Intriguing and delicious. Aromas of dark chocolate, plum, black cherry, cedar and tarragon jump from the glass.
A potent perfumed mix of berries, fresh herbs and roasted notes with a bit a mineral. A compelling blend of fresh and bright aroma next the rich and dark.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681217834182{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/product-img-1.jpg?id=677) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][vc_empty_space height="700px" height_tablet="500px" height_mobile="350px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218263514{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681217860728{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/product-img-2.jpg?id=678) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][vc_empty_space height="700px" height_tablet="500px" height_mobile="350px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218032015{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6" css_tablet=".vc_custom_1681218032015{padding: 15% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Food pairing notes" subtitle="Wine specs"][vc_column_text css_animation=""]One of our favorite blocks from the Villenoir vineyard. This block tends to lift the aromatic character and soften the palate of our Cabernet Sauvignon. We are proud to offer this very limited and barrel selected wine as a stand alone block.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" reverse_columns_mobile="yes" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218268463{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218040522{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6" css_tablet=".vc_custom_1681218040523{padding: 15% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Winemaker notes" subtitle="Wine specs"][vc_column_text css_animation=""]Deep garnet with a vibrant ruby edge, velvety soft on the palate with bright cherry to plum flavors. This wine is weighty and full of fresh ripe berries with rich, dark accents of cocoa nib. Intriguing and delicious.
Aromas of dark chocolate, plum, black cherry, cedar and tarragon jump from the glass.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681217877972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/product-img-3.jpg?id=679) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][vc_empty_space height="700px" height_tablet="500px" height_mobile="350px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Served well-chilled our authentically made Cabernet Sauvignon is a refreshingly delicate dry wine with hints of strawberry, citrus, and peach laced fruit.

[vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" reverse_columns_mobile="yes" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218257591{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218019260{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6" css_tablet=".vc_custom_1681218019261{padding: 15% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Tasting notes" subtitle="Wine specs"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1460727890422{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Deep garnet with a vibrant ruby edge, velvety soft on the palate with bright cherry to plum flavors. This wine is weighty and full of fresh ripe berries with rich, dark accents of cocoa nib. Intriguing and delicious. Aromas of dark chocolate, plum, black cherry, cedar and tarragon jump from the glass.
A potent perfumed mix of berries, fresh herbs and roasted notes with a bit a mineral. A compelling blend of fresh and bright aroma next the rich and dark.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681217834182{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/product-img-1.jpg?id=677) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][vc_empty_space height="700px" height_tablet="500px" height_mobile="350px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218263514{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681217860728{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/product-img-2.jpg?id=678) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6"][vc_empty_space height="700px" height_tablet="500px" height_mobile="350px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681218032015{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6" css_tablet=".vc_custom_1681218032015{padding: 15% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Food pairing notes" subtitle="Wine specs"][vc_column_text css_animation=""]One of our favorite blocks from the Villenoir vineyard. !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" subtitle="The vineyards" subtitle_font_color="#b0976d" title="Our vineyards are strategically located in a region known for its stunning wine-growing landscapes." css=".vc_custom_1680862487928{margin-right: 130px !important;margin-left: -130px !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1680862487929{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681080688136{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1681080688137{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"]We cultivate around 20 hectares of vines which benefit from favorable climatic conditions, protected from extreme conditions. The majority of our plots of vines are devoted to the production of red grapes. The grape varieties planted are Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot. A small area of the vineyard is also planted with white grape varieties; Sauvignon Blanc and Semillon.[/vc_column_text][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" subtitle="Soil" subtitle_font_color="#b0976d" css=".vc_custom_1680875001356{margin-bottom: 15px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1680875001357{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1680874488421{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1680874488422{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"]Our soils are lean and shallow, well-draining with hard bedrock below.[/vc_column_text][title_subtitle add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" subtitle="Climate" subtitle_font_color="#b0976d" css=".vc_custom_1680875012783{margin-bottom: 15px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1680875012784{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1680874493887{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}" css_mobile=".vc_custom_1680874493888{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"]Billowing morning fog gives way to warm afternoon sunlight. Come evening, a salty breeze rustles through the vines.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1681079918947{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background: #f1f1f1 url(http://okthemes.com/villenoirdemonew/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/our-story-header-image-11-17.jpg?id=2294);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column css_animation=""][vc_empty_space height="200px"][video_link icon_color="primary-color" icon_size="icon-size-normal" align="text-align-center" css_animation="" video_link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0UnqGm_miA"][vc_empty_space height="200px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1677365943121{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css_animation=""][title_subtitle title_type="h2" add_subtitle="use_subtitle" css_animation="" title="Lastest releases" subtitle="Our wines"][vc_column_text css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1676987148453{margin-bottom: 65px !important;}"]We invite you to indulge in our award-winning wines and experience the passion and dedication that goes into every sip. Vestibulum imperdiet commodo neque nec vestibulum. Fusce ultricies ut orci sed euismod. Sed sit amet vestibulum nunc.
Curabitur eu volutpat urna. Nunc turpis lorem, malesuada eu mauris et, commodo facilisis risus. Vestibulum lobortis facilisis felis, quis laoreet elit porttitor sit amet.
